metadata.title: Tuesday, 16th February, 2021
metadata.session: FIFTH SESSION OF THE TWELFTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Mines and Minerals Development
parts: (a) whether the Zambia Consolidated Copper Mines Investment Holdings (ZCCM-IH) had renewed the golden share held in the Mopani Copper Mines prior to Glencore, the majority shareholder, announcing their pull out from Mopani;
(b) if the shareholding was not renewed, what the implications are; and
(c) what prompted Glencore to leave Mopani Copper Mines when they were the majority shareholders.
(a) whether the Government has any plans to construct a local court building in Solwezi East Parliamentary Constituency;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented; and
(c) if there are no such plans, why.
(a) whether the Government has any plans to construct a university college of science and mathematics west of Nalolo District, which has a higher population than the eastern part;
(b) if so, when the construction works will begin; and
(c) what the estimated time frame for the completion of the project is.
(a) how many cases of assault and malicious damage to property were reported to the police during the by-election in Roan Parliamentary Constituency in April, 2019;
(b) how many people were arrested for assault and causing damage to property;
(c) how many people have since been convicted; and

(d) if no arrests were made, why.
